pages.text:
News Flash
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE: South Miami Police Department Joins Regional Crackdown on Speeding Drivers
The South Miami Police Department, in partnership with local and regional law enforcement agencies, is participating in Operation Southern Slow Down from July 14–19, 2025.
Read on...
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE: City of South Miami Closes Out Tree Planting Grant with Arbor Day Celebration
The City of South Miami proudly marked the close-out of its Welsh Tree Planting Grant with a successful and community-centered Arbor Day celebration on Saturday, April 26, at Vice Mayor Robert C. Welsh Jr. Park.
Read on...
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE: City of South Miami Launches Meters for Trees in Partnership with PayByPhone
SOUTH MIAMI, FLORIDA– The City of South Miami today announces it has signed up to Meters for Trees, the multi-award-winning tree planting initiative from PayByPhone, the global leader in mobile parking payments.
Read on...
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE: South Miami Police Department Elevates Transparency and Community Engagement
In a step toward deepening community trust and transparency, the South Miami Police Department (SMPD) has expanded its partnership with Axon, rolling out the latest advancements in body-worn camera and public safety technology.
Read on...
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE: SMPD Launches New Community Engagement Tool
The South Miami Police Department announces the launch of Axon’s My90, an 
innovative tool designed to strengthen the department’s relationships with the community and improve 
department operations.
Read on...
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE: SoMi Introducing free, on-demand transit program, “MetroConnect SoMi.”
The new microtransit program, which replaces the Freebee service, will allow seamless connections with local destinations and regional transit lines.
Read on...
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE: City of South Miami Launches Residential Parking Discount Program
SOUTH MIAMI, FL – The City of South Miami is thrilled to announce its partnership with ParkMobile to introduce the Residential Parking Discount Program.
Read on...
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE: South Miami Police Implements Advanced Speed Detection Systems
South Miami is taking a significant step towards enhancing school zone safety with the introduction of cutting-edge speed detection systems, following the enactment of House Bill 657.
Read on...
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE: SMPD Launches Project Lifesaver; Welcomes First Registrant
South Miami, FL – The City of South Miami Police Department is proud to announce the successful registration of the first participant in its newly launched Project Lifesaver program.
Read on...
